headline.main: DENIES HELPING GERMANY; Akron Man Pleads Innocent to Propaganda Charge

abstract: F B Burch, Akron atty, pleads innocent to failure to register as German propaganda agent; linked with former German Consul K Kapp, Cleveland; freed in bail, Wash
snippet: F B Burch, Akron atty, pleads innocent to failure to register as German propaganda agent; linked with former German Consul K Kapp, Cleveland; freed in bail, Wash...
